summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 8, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses (sick, annual), and overtime/comp time occurrences for correctional and non-correctional services staff.

events.title: MCC NY Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift change log for correctional facility staff.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a routine staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 8, 2019.
The document shows numerous staff status changes to 'Sick Leave' and 'Annual Leave' throughout the recorded period.
The roster includes posts and assignments such as SHU (Special Housing Unit), CONTROL, LOBBY, VISIT, and special assignments like TREATY and ALLENWOOD.
The document records 34 overtime occurrences and 3 comp time occurrences for the date.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it relates to the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
